metadata.name: Memorial Badge Airdrop
metadata.description:
Quest3 reward NFTs is designed and distributed by communities. Eligible users can claimed airdrop rewards from Quest3. Not every airdrop will issue reward NFTs. Whether there is a rewarded NFT is determined when the airdrop is initially set up. Quest3 is a Web3 quest and event platform. Users can earn tokens and NFT badges by participating in quests and events. You can see more details of the Quest3 reward NFTs from [app.quest3.xyz](https://app.quest3.xyz)

Learn more: [quest3.xyz](https://quest3.xyz)
